verses.verse: <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was [forty] <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8147>[thirty]-two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that was in <S%H1387>Geba,<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of [it.] Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H3605>throughout<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H8085>hear.<s%>"

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H559>news<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H887>become<s%> <S%H887>odious<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> were then <S%H6817>summoned<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> at <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>

Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H622>assembled<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 30000 <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and 6000 <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H5971>people<s%> like the <S%H2344>sand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3220>seashore<s%> <S%H8193><s%> in <S%H7230>abundance;<s%> and they <S%H5927>came<s%> up and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash,<s%> <S%H6926>east<s%> of Beth-aven.

When the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were in a <S%H9496>strait<s%> (for the <S%H5971>people<s%> were hard-pressed), then the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves in <S%H4631>caves,<s%> in <S%H2336>thickets,<s%> in <S%H5553>cliffs,<s%> in <S%H6877>cellars,<s%> and in <S%H953>pits.<s%>

Also [some of] the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%> But as for <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> he [was] <S%H5750>still<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> him <S%H2729>trembling.<s%>

Now he <S%H3176>waited<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> according to the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time<s%> <S%H834>set<s%> by <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> but <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> did not <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6327>scattering<s%> from him.

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5066>"Bring<s%> to me the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>" And he <S%H5927>offered<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

But <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%>?" And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H9339>scattering<s%> from me, and that you did not <S%H935>come<s%> within the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H622>assembling<s%> at <S%H4363>Michmash,<s%>

therefore I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6258>'Now<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> me at <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and I have not <S%H9134>asked<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' So I <S%H662>forced<s%> myself and <S%H5927>offered<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%> "

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "You have <S%H5528>acted<s%> <S%H5528>foolishly;<s%> you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, for <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> would have <S%H3559>established<s%> your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

"But <S%H6258>now<s%> your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall not <S%H6965>endure.<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1245>sought<s%> out for Himself a <S%H376>man<s%> after His own <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>appointed<s%> him as <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you."

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H4672>present<s%> with him, about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

Now <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H4672>present<s%> with them were <S%H3427>staying<s%> in <S%H1387>Geba<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> while the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H2583>camped<s%> at <S%H4363>Michmash.<s%>
